thread.title: Djibril Cisse arrested in blackmail case
thread.title_full: Djibril Cisse arrested in blackmail case

title: Djibril Cisse arrested in blackmail case
text:
CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE PARIS (AP) â€” Former France striker Djibril Cisse has been arrested as part of an investigation into a blackmail case that allegedly involves another football player.
Versailles prosecutor's office said in a statement that three other people were also put in custody on Tuesday morning.
Cisse is accused of conspiracy to blackmail, a charge with a maximum prison sentence of five years.
A prosecutor's spokeswoman said the identity of the victim won't be revealed "out of respect for his/her private life."
The 34-year-old Cisse, whose career has been marred by injuries, is currently without a club. A former Liverpool player, Cisse scored nine goals in 41 games for France.
